column4: Tesla raises borrowing capacity for car leases to $1.1 billion
column5: Tesla Inc  said on Friday it has increased its borrowing capacity for a car lease program to $1.1 billion from $600 million.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla raises borrowing capacity for car leases to $1.1 bln
column5: Oct 20 Tesla Inc said on Friday it has increased its borrowing capacity for a car lease program to $1.1 billion from $600 million.

column4: Consumer Reports says Tesla misunderstands 'positive' Model 3 rating
column5: DETROIT Consumer Reports said on Friday that Tesla Inc  had apparently misunderstood the "average" reliability rating the magazine assigned to the electric carmaker's Model 3 sedan this week  calling it generally "positive" for an all-new vehicle.

column4: Consumer Reports says Tesla misunderstands 'positive' Model 3 rating
column5: DETROIT  Oct 20 Consumer Reports said on Friday that Tesla Inc had apparently misunderstood the "average" reliability rating the magazine assigned to the electric carmaker's Model 3 sedan this week  calling it generally "positive" for an all-new vehicle.
